stepTitle: At the movie theater, the total value of tickets sold was $$\$2, 612.50$$. Adult tickets sold for $10 each and $$\frac{senior}{child}$$ tickets sold for $$\$7.50$$ each. The number of $$\frac{senior}{child}$$ tickets sold was $$25$$ less than twice the number of adult tickets sold. How many $$\frac{senior}{child}$$ tickets and how many adult tickets were sold?
